txt_en: Don't let the mistakes and disappointments of the past control and direct your future.
txt_cn: 不要让未来的你被过去的错误与失望所掌控。
author: Zig Ziglar

txt_en: Don't be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
txt_cn: 别为困难所迫，要以梦想为引。
author: 爱默生

txt_en: This universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
txt_cn: 宇宙并不在你之外。看看自己的内心吧。你想要的一切，都已尽在你身。
author: Rumi

txt_en: This universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
txt_cn: 宇宙并不在你之外。看看自己的内心吧。你想要的一切，都已尽在你身。
author: Rumi

txt_en: The most difficult thing is the decision to act; the rest is merely tenacity.
txt_cn: 最困难的是下定决心去做，剩下的只是坚持而已。
author: Amelia Earhart

txt_en: Life is not only merriment. It is desire and determination.
txt_cn: 生活并不只有欢声笑语，还得要有抱负和决心。
author: 纪伯伦

txt_en: What you seek is seeking you.
txt_cn: 你正在寻找的东西也在找寻你。
author: Rumi

txt_en: It is the power of thought that gives man power over nature.
txt_cn: 人类之所以能够驾驭自然，是因为思想的力量。
author: 安徒生

txt_en: It is not because things are difficult that we do not dare; it is because we do not dare that they are difficult.
txt_cn: 并不是因为事情难我们才不敢去做，而是因为我们不敢做事情才难。
author: Seneca
